item.title: What's the problem?
item.description: How are we different? WtP is not intended for just startup enthusiasts. It is intended for anyone interested in learning about some of the biggest environmental and societal issues we face today. In the fast-paced world of startups, Aakash Kapur delved deep into the grit beneath the glamour. His podcast during his MBA wasnâ€™t about showcasing shiny companies or charismatic leaders; it was about uncovering the real challenges driving these founders.
